We stumbled upon this looking for a cute place to grab some cava and chill.  We ended up have several glasses of cava and had to order the patatas bravas with all that cava.  The patatas bravas was among the best that we had in Barcelona.  We very much enjoyed the bodegueta to sit inside among a delightful crowd, enjoy the tapas, the cava and the lively staff.  I highly recommend stopping in for just a drink or tapas too.  Great experience!  Cava on...
